column4: ok, i got the stuff that i need to get from https://wiki.ubuntu.com/RestrictedFormats but it still doesn't play the mp3's. it says the resource is not a valid stream.! i'm using rythmbox
what is the problem? maybe i can solve it
i used the sudo apt-get install gstreamer0.8-plugins gstreamer0.8-plugins-multiverse gstreamer0.8-ffmpeg command like it said on the wiki
